name: Screencloud Limited
description: Developer of software designed to project videos, images, and social media onto digital signage screens. The company's software helps in the rapid development of modern hypertext markup language digital signage apps and deploys them across a network of screens, enabling advertisers to manage content on screens and control multiple screens at once.
one_liner: Developer of software designed to project videos, images, and social media onto digital signage screens. The company's software helps in the rapid development of modern hypertext markup language digital signage apps and deploys them across a network of screens, enabling advertisers to manage content on screens and control multiple screens at once.
